message.content: Help me set the command timeout to 30 minutes

content.text: The command timeout has been set to 30 minutes (1,800,000 milliseconds) in your Claude settings file.

message.content: No you need to use the BASH_MAX_TIMEOUT_MS environment variable

content.text: You're right! I need to set the `BASH_MAX_TIMEOUT_MS` environment variable instead. Let me update the settings file to include this environment variable.

input.old_string:
{
  "permissions": {
    "allow": [
      "Bash(find:*)",
      "Bash(ls:*)",
      "WebFetch(domain:github.com)",
      "Bash(gh issue list:*)",
      "Bash(gh issue view:*)",
      "Bash(npx prettier:*)",
      "mcp__nx__nx_workspace",
      "mcp__nx__nx_project_details",
      "Bash(nx show projects:*)",
      "Bash(nx run-many:*)",
      "Bash(nx lint:*)",
      "Bash(nx test:*)",
      "Bash(nx build:*)",
      "Bash(nx documentation:*)"
    ],
    "deny": []
  },
  "enableAllProjectMcpServers": true,
  "commandTimeout": 1800000
}
input.new_string:
{
  "permissions": {
    "allow": [
      "Bash(find:*)",
      "Bash(ls:*)",
      "WebFetch(domain:github.com)",
      "Bash(gh issue list:*)",
      "Bash(gh issue view:*)",
      "Bash(npx prettier:*)",
      "mcp__nx__nx_workspace",
      "mcp__nx__nx_project_details",
      "Bash(nx show projects:*)",
      "Bash(nx run-many:*)",
      "Bash(nx lint:*)",
      "Bash(nx test:*)",
      "Bash(nx build:*)",
      "Bash(nx documentation:*)"
    ],
    "deny": []
  },
  "enableAllProjectMcpServers": true,
  "environmentVariables": {
    "BASH_MAX_TIMEOUT_MS": "1800000"
  }
}
